Yanshosh and I, so far, are roleplaying these guys. When they combine they =
are under each of our control, but make sure to read the posts of the other=
s so they know what is going on.

::Sea Clamp/Cicadon/Ramhorn::

    The in=
famous members of the Tripredacus Council had learned of what was going on =
on past Earth. They decided that it was nessary for their personal interven=
tion. Preparing a ship to leave they had a crew of about forty bots, none w=
ith Beast Modes. They themselves had reengineered their bodies to accomadat=
e Beast Modes and a Gestalt.
    The ship, Nostromo, left the dock. It crea=
ted a Transwarp conduit and went through. Soon they were all through. Sea C=
lamp was at the helm, Cicadon was at the Navagation, and Ramhorn was mannin=
g the weapons systems. Almost all of the lights had gone out, all that was =
on were red warning lights, which would make it difficult for anybody to se=
e. The crew had been eradicated, no chance for rebellion. But, smartly, the=
ir Sparks had not been extinguised, they had been stored in small capsules =
for later use. Tripredacus had been looking for the last remaining ones whe=
n they saw something they did not expect. The Ark. In Space. They knew this=
 was a great chance, but the last of the remianing Predacons attacked them =
at that point. They did not have the chance to destroy the Ark. But they wo=
uld. The last of the rebels had been ejected from the ship.
    The Nostrom=
o had a easy landing. Tripredacus dismanteled the thruster system, Sea Clam=
p spoke up in a raspy voice. "No one goes home."
    "Agreed," The other tw=
o said. They decided to look for the other Predacons on this planet, and be=
gin their plan of the destruction of the Ark, and the Autobots.
